org.springframework.data.rest.core.annotation

Annotation Type RepositoryRestResource


  • @Target(value=TYPE)
 @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
 @Inherited
public @interface RepositoryRestResource
    Annotate a org.springframework.data.repository.Repository with this to customize export mapping and rels.

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      Description collectionResourceDescription
      The description of the collection resource.
      java.lang.String collectionResourceRel
      The rel value to use when generating links to the collection resource.
      java.lang.Class<?> excerptProjection
      Configures the projection type to be used when embedding item resources into collections and related resources.
      boolean exported
      Flag indicating whether this resource is exported at all.
      Description itemResourceDescription
      The description of the item resource.
      java.lang.String itemResourceRel
      The rel value to use when generating links to the item resource.
      java.lang.String path
      The path segment under which this resource is to be exported.

    • Element Detail

      • exported

        public abstract boolean exported
        Flag indicating whether this resource is exported at all.
        Returns:
        true if the resource is to be exported, false otherwise.
        Default:
        true

      • path

        public abstract java.lang.String path
        The path segment under which this resource is to be exported.
        Returns:
        A valid path segment.
        Default:
        ""

      • collectionResourceRel

        public abstract java.lang.String collectionResourceRel
        The rel value to use when generating links to the collection resource.
        Returns:
        A valid rel value.
        Default:
        ""

      • collectionResourceDescription

        public abstract Description collectionResourceDescription
        The description of the collection resource.
        Returns:
        Default:
        @org.springframework.data.rest.core.annotation.Description("")

      • itemResourceRel

        public abstract java.lang.String itemResourceRel
        The rel value to use when generating links to the item resource.
        Returns:
        A valid rel value.
        Default:
        ""

      • itemResourceDescription

        public abstract Description itemResourceDescription
        The description of the item resource.
        Returns:
        Default:
        @org.springframework.data.rest.core.annotation.Description("")

      • excerptProjection

        public abstract java.lang.Class<?> excerptProjection
        Configures the projection type to be used when embedding item resources into collections and related resources. Defaults to RepositoryRestResource.None, which indicates full rendering of the items in a collection resource and no inlining of related resources.
        Returns:
        Default:
        org.springframework.data.rest.core.annotation.RepositoryRestResource.None.class
